p: The proton ( 1H and 13C) nuclear magnetic spectra were recorded at 298 K on a 400 and 101 MHz NMR spectrophotometer (Bruker, Germany). The samples were prepared as solutions in 100% CDCl 3, using approximately 1â€“3 mg of the BS utilizing tetramethylsilane (TMS) as an internal standard ( Pemmaraju et al., 2012).
